articles.title: Unable To Pay Salaries, Byju's Founder Takes Loan Against His Home: Report - NDTV
articles.description: Byju Raveendran, the eponymous founder of edtech titan Byju's, has pledged his home as well as those owned by his family members to raise money for paying employees as the company battles a cash crunch.
articles.content:
Byju Raveendran has raised debts of about $400 million on a personal level. (File)

articles.title: Spotify’s layoffs make sense when you consider its margins and market - TechCrunch
articles.description: Spotify is simply tinkering with its economics so that it is more attractive to investors. That means it needs to pay fewer salaries.

articles.title: “Chill Factor” – The Volcanic Plot Twist in Dinosaur Extinction - SciTechDaily
articles.description: McGill researchers challenge the current understanding of dinosaur extinction by unearthing a link between volcanic eruptions and climate change. What wiped out the dinosaurs? A meteorite plummeting to Earth is only part of the story, a new study suggests. Cl…
articles.content: Recent research suggests that volcanic eruptions, causing global cooling, significantly contributed to the dinosaurs’ extinction, challenging the long-held belief that a meteorite was the sole cause.… [+3405 chars]
